description: DNA Microarray Hybridization Oven has a small footprint and an operating temperature range of + 5 °C to 70 °C (+/- 0.1 °C). It provides a series of accessories, including rotating frame, rotating frame Steering rod, hybridization and cleaning reagents. Therefore, the target sample can be more accurately identified during the analysis.
name: DNA Microarray Hybridization Oven
